Perhaps I did not understand your answer well, but I still see my questions as legitimate, especially since the service is new and still needs a lot of effort to gain the trust of the community.Hello, Thanks for getting back. Since the topic of our post is the website's home page, the Currency Exchange (converter), we don't require users to register or get verified in our site. You can exchange without registering an account. KYC is not required. Legal currencies are fiat currencies. If you plan to use other features in our site, like buying crypto coins, registering an account is a must. Why? We must perform KYC verification for users purchasing and selling coins due to legal restrictions, to make sure you don't use our website to engage in illicit activities like money laundering.  If you need to use fiat currency to purchase a cryptocurrency, it can only be used after the KYC verification is completed.If a non-registered user uses our home page, and the order fails to be converted successfully, we will return your funds to the original way. In this case, you may please provide your order number so we can help you. Live chat on the website is also available, and other contact details are also provided. Non-registered/verified users can message. Please be aware that once a transaction has been initiated and the system accepts it, it cannot be canceled. Please confirm and double-check that the order is correct before proceeding with the transaction. The instant exchange function transaction cannot be canceled as long as you successfully transfer to the account you provide. If you haven't transferred the money, just stop the transfer or get a new order. Old orders can be ignored. I hope this helps.
